Promoting To Production

Promoting To Production

jx get applications -e production

jx get applications -e staging

VERSION=[...]

jx promote jx-go --version $VERSION --env production -b

jx get applications -e production

PROD_ADDR=[...]

curl "$PROD_ADDR/demo/hello"
